Content.Name: Caldecott Award
Content.Title: Caldecott Award
Content.BodyCopy:
Caldecott Medal Award Winners

The Caldecott Medal honors nineteenth-century English illustrator Randolph Caldecott. It is awarded annually by the American Library Association to the illustrator of an American picture book for children. 

For a list that includes Caldecott Honor books, please click on this link.
